snippet: Driven by growth in wireless subscribers, the net income was above the expectations of Wall Street analysts.
abstract: Verizon Communications reports second-quarter profit of $2.25 billion, or 78 cents a share, up 23 percent from year-ago quarter; revenue rose 4.3 percent to $29.8 billion.
lead_paragraph: Driven by growth in wireless subscribers, the net income was above the expectations of Wall Street analysts.

headline.main: At Verizon, Wireless Aids Earnings Rise
headline.print_headline: At Verizon, Wireless Aids Earnings Rise
